trans-unit.source: Show these channels in the front end form.
trans-unit.target: Prikaži izbrane vrste e-novic na strani.

trans-unit.source: Please select one or more channels.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo izberite eno ali več vrst e-novic.

trans-unit.source: Do not show the channel selection menu.
trans-unit.target: Ne prikazuj izbirnega menija za vrste e-novic.

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names), ##domain## (domain name) and ##link## (activation link).
trans-unit.target: Uporabite lahko "wildcards" ##channels## (za imena e-novic), ##domain## (ime domene) in ##link## (aktivacijska povezava).

trans-unit.source: You can use the wildcards ##channels## (channel names) and ##domain## (domain name).
trans-unit.target: Uporabite lahko "wildcards" ##channels## (za imena novic) in ##domain## (ime domene).

trans-unit.source: Here you can select the newsletter template.
trans-unit.target: Tukaj lahko izberete predlogo za e-novico.

trans-unit.source:
You have subscribed to the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
Please click ##link## to activate your subscription. If you did not subscribe yourself, please ignore this e-mail.
trans-unit.target:
Naročili ste se na naslednje novice na ##domain##:
##channels##
Prosimo kliknite ##link## za aktivacijo vaše prijave. Če se niste prijavili vi, prosimo ignorirajte ta e-mail.

trans-unit.source:
You have unsubscribed from the following channels on ##domain##:
##channels##
trans-unit.target:
Odjavili ste se z e-novic na ##domain##:
##channels##
